ministry.name: New Life Ministry
ministry.overview: The New Life Ministry, aka the Prayer Room Ministry, meets with those that have dedicated their life to Jesus during a service.

long-description.heading: Purpose
long-description.p: As “New Life” prayer partners, we exist to usher in new believers in Christ and to come alongside them with encouragement and love. We provide practical information to assist them in their growth in Christ.
long-description.heading: Vision
long-description.p: “New Life” prayer partners’ vision is to be a group of men and women with prayerful hearts who bring an attitude of hospitality and welcome to each divine appointment God grants.

I pray for you constantly, asking God, the glorious Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, to give you spiritual wisdom and understanding, so that you might grow in your knowledge of God.
--Ephesians 1:16b,17 (NLT)
long-description.heading: Join us!
long-description.p: We invite you to prayerfully consider New Life Ministry as a way to serve here at Calvary Chapel Austin. This is a ministry which is created for mature Christians who enjoy praying with others. Come and experience the joy of sharing a moment with men and women as they dedicate their lives to Jesus Christ.
long-description.heading: Blue Letter Bible
long-description.p: Please feel free to use the following link for the Blueletter Bible. This resource has a free bible, commentaries and other useful study guides that will get you started in your new relationship with Jesus Christ.
